# BountyMod - Fabric Minecraft Mod 1.21.3

## Project Overview
A Minecraft Fabric mod that allows players to place bounties on other players with custom item rewards.

## Project Structure
- `src/main/java/com/bountymod/` - Main source code
- `src/main/resources/` - Mod resources and configuration
- Gradle build system for Fabric mod compilation

## Development Status
- [x] Project scaffolding created
- [ ] Core mod files implemented
- [ ] GUI system implemented
- [ ] Command system implemented
- [ ] Data persistence implemented
